title: An approach to automatic fault detection in four-point system for knitted fabric with our benchmark dataset Isl-Knit
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Avishek Das Gupta, Zafar Sadek, MD. Shakhawat Hossain, Tarik Reza Toha, Anupom Mondol, Sultana Umme Habiba, Shaikh Md. Mominul Alam
